## What is meta-analysis? {.firstslide}

- Statistical procedure for synthesising effect size results from different studies
- Part of a systematic review
  + <font size="3">Transparent and reproducible literature searches</font>
  + <font size="3">Reproducible inclusion and exclusion criteria</font>

```{r,  out.height= "250px", fig.align='center', echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("http://meta-evidence.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Presentation1-4-1024x576.png")
```

- Identifies gaps and biases in existing research
- Explore why effects vary across studies
- Can test specific hypotheses
